$KmsClient = new Aws\Kms\KmsClient([
    'profile' => 'default',
    'version' => '2014-11-01',
    'region' => 'us-east-2'
]);

$aliasName = "alias/projectKey1";

try {
    $result = $KmsClient->deleteAlias([
        'AliasName' => $aliasName,
    ]);
    var_dump($result);
} catch (AwsException $e) {
    // output error message if fails
    echo $e->getMessage();
    echo "\n";
}
